discussion.title: How to add dimensionless constraints - Π theorem
discussion.body: Hello, how can I use the custom loss function to (1) obtain the dimension exponential vector of the variable (2) If I can obtain it, I can add the dimensionless constraint -Π theorem to get the desired dimensionless parameter I am not very good at writing Julia code, and I always get an error when using Unitful.Dimensions() I would like to ask you how to do it, thank you

nodes.body:
`dimensionless_constants_only= True `
I wonder if this line of code has converged to or found a trend for dimensionless parameters，i guess
